import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import { register } from '../services/api'; import './Register.css'; const Register = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [lang, setLang] = useState('en'); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', phoneNumber: '', age: '', state: '', district: '', occupation: '', annualIncome: '', category: '', gender: '' }); const states = [ 'Andhra Pradesh', 'Arunachal Pradesh', 'Assam', 'Bihar', 'Chhattisgarh', 'Goa', 'Gujarat', 'Haryana', 'Himachal Pradesh', 'Jharkhand', 'Karnataka', 'Kerala', 'Madhya Pradesh', 'Maharashtra', 'Manipur', 'Meghalaya', 'Mizoram', 'Nagaland', 'Odisha', 'Punjab', 'Rajasthan', 'Sikkim', 'Tamil Nadu', 'Telangana', 'Tripura', 'Uttar Pradesh', 'Uttarakhand', 'West Bengal' ]; const occupations = [ { en: 'Farmer', hi: '‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ‡§®' }, { en: 'Student', hi: '‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ / ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ' }, { en: 'Government Employee', hi: '‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä' }, { en: 'Private Employee', hi: '‡§®‡§ø‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä' }, { en: 'Self Employed', hi: '‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ-‡§∞‡•ã‡§ú‡§ó‡§æ‡§∞' }, { en: 'Business Owner', hi: '‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡•Ä' }, { en: 'Unemployed', hi: '‡§¨‡•á‡§∞‡•ã‡§ú‡§ó‡§æ‡§∞' }, { en: 'Retired', hi: '‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ‡§®‡§ø‡§µ‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§§' }, { en: 'Daily Wage Worker', hi: '‡§¶‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞' }, { en: 'Agricultural Laborer', hi: '‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡§ø ‡§Æ‡§ú‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∞' }, { en: 'Artisan / Craftsman', hi: '‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ó‡§∞ / ‡§∂‡§ø‡§≤‡•ç‡§™‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞' }, { en: 'Housewife', hi: '‡§ó‡•É‡§π‡§ø‡§£‡•Ä' }, { en: 'Other', hi: '‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø' } ]; const categories = [ { en: 'General', hi: '‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø' }, { en: 'OBC', hi: '‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§™‡§ø‡§õ‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó' }, { en: 'SC', hi: '‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§∏‡•Ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§ø' }, { en: 'ST', hi: '‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§∏‡•Ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ú‡§®‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§ø' } ]; const genders = [ { en: 'Male', hi: '‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§∑' }, { en: 'Female', hi: '‡§Æ‡§π‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ' }, { en: 'Other', hi: '‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø' } ]; const text = { en: { title: 'Government Scheme Portal Registration', subtitle: 'Register to discover government benefits', language: 'Language', firstName: 'First Name', lastName: 'Last Name', email: 'Email Address', password: 'Password', confirmPassword: 'Confirm Password', phoneNumber: 'Mobile Number', age: 'Age', state: 'State', district: 'District', occupation: 'Occupation', annualIncome: 'Annual Income (‚Çπ)', category: 'Category', gender: 'Gender', selectState: 'Select State', selectOccupation: 'Select Occupation', selectCategory: 'Select Category', selectGender: 'Select Gender', register: 'Register', haveAccount: 'Already have an account?', loginHere: 'Login here', mandatoryFields: 'All fields are mandatory', govIndia: 'Government of India' }, hi: { title: '‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü‡§≤ ‡§™‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§ï‡§∞‡§£', subtitle: '‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ñ‡•ã‡§ú ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç', language: '‡§≠‡§æ‡§∑‡§æ', firstName: '‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ', lastName: '‡§â‡§™‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ', email: '‡§à‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§™‡§§‡§æ', password: '‡§™‡§æ‡§∏‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§°', confirmPassword: '‡§™‡§æ‡§∏‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§° ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç', phoneNumber: '‡§Æ‡•ã‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§≤ ‡§®‡§Ç‡§¨‡§∞', age: '‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•Å', state: '‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø', district: '‡§ú‡§ø‡§≤‡§æ', occupation: '‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø', annualIncome: '‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§Ø (‚Çπ)', category: '‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§£‡•Ä', gender: '‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó', selectState: '‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•á‡§Ç', selectOccupation: '‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•á‡§Ç', selectCategory: '‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§£‡•Ä ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•á‡§Ç', selectGender: '‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•á‡§Ç', register: '‡§™‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç', haveAccount: '‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à?', loginHere: '‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§≤‡•â‡§ó‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç', mandatoryFields: '‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§´‡§º‡•Ä‡§≤‡•ç‡§° ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç', govIndia: '‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§ ‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞' } }; const t = text[lang]; const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) { toast.error(lang === 'en' ? 'Passwords do not match' : '‡§™‡§æ‡§∏‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§° ‡§Æ‡•á‡§≤ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§§‡•á'); return; } try { const { confirmPassword, ...registerData } = formData; registerData.age = parseInt(registerData.age); registerData.annualIncome = parseFloat(registerData.annualIncome); await register(registerData); toast.success(lang === 'en' ? 'Registration successful! Please login.' : '‡§™‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§∏‡§´‡§≤! ‡§ï‡•É‡§™‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§≤‡•â‡§ó‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§'); setTimeout(() => navigate('/login'), 2000); } catch (error) { toast.error(error.response?.data?.error || (lang === 'en' ? 'Registration failed' : '‡§™‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§´‡§≤')); } }; return (
üáÆüá≥

¬© 2026 {t.govIndia} | {lang === 'hi' ? '‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü‡§≤' : 'Government Scheme Portal'}

); }; export default Register;
